pr_title: Fix the Hibernate Search configuration documentation

timeline.message:
Fix the Hibernate Search configuration documentation

Fixes #8993

timeline.bodyText: Not related but should this be an enum instead given that we only have four possible values?
timeline.author: machi1990
timeline.diffHunk:
